column4: hey, that's wierd! When I installed konqueror I'm pretty sure it installed nearly 1 GB of stuff (and a but load more than just 1 package). When I do a sudo apt-get remove konqueror it comes back with removing 1 package (konqueror) and only freeing 3.499 kB of space.
if you're using gnome or another wm, it probably installed KDE libs
